title: Photography Competition
text: Some say a picture is worth a thousand words - so FoSCL is asking those with an artistic bent to take part in our photography competition.
The theme wil be the wonderful village of Sonning Common and the beautiful countryside that surrounds it.
The winning entries will be turned in to postcards!
If you are thinking of entering please make sure you read the rules.

title: Volunteers Social Evening
text: An opportunity to meet the committee and other volunteers.

title: Sonning Common Primary School Fair
text: FoSCL will once again be running stalls at the School Fair.
A Book Stall and a Tombola Stall
We will be asking for volunteeers to set up and manage the stalls

title: National Libraries Week
text: We are in the process of planning a programme of events

title: FoSCL Annual Quiz
text: We are repeating our very successful Quiz.
Our Quiz masters will provide a great range of interesting questions. We will have a bar with wine, beer, soft drinks and nibbles available. There will be a raffle with a variety of wonderful prizes.
tickets: Tickets will go on sale at the Library and Occasions from 1st September 2019.

title: FoSCL AGM
text: The date is yet to be decided

title: Christmas Refeshments
text: Do come along and join us
